name: cview
description: Cview is a webpage for making CV's, Resumees and more information n about workers and companies

scripts.usemin: usemin company.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/company.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin jobs.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/jobs.html && usemin profile.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/profile.html && usemin workers.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/workers.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfonts && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin

author: Miguel Gallego
